page.title: 07Entertainment
page.content: Simon tells us about what he and his friends do for entertainment. "There are no{CINEMAS}in Wolvey, it is much too small for that kind of thing. If we go to see a film we usually go to Hinckley or sometimes Coventry. We also go to Hinckley or Nuneaton if we go{SWIMMING}as there are good swimming pools in those towns. We sometimes make our own{ {ENTERTAINMENT}in the village. There is a{YOUTH CLUB}at Wolvey School which is open every Wednesday from 7.30pm to 9.30pm.The membership subscription is 15p and the age range is from about 8 years to about 18 years old. It is run by a husband and wife called Alan and Jessie Fulford.The average weekly attendance is about 30 to 40 people.We play snooker, table-tennis and listen to records.
